communityGuidelines.beRespectfulDesc: Treat everyone with kindness and respect. We're all here to make meaningful connections, so please be courteous in your interactions.
communityGuidelines.authenticProfilesDesc: Use real photos of yourself and accurate information. Catfishing or misleading profiles are not allowed and will result in account suspension.
communityGuidelines.safeInteractionsDesc: Meet in public places for your first few dates. Always prioritize your safety and trust your instincts when meeting someone new.
communityGuidelines.noHarassmentDesc: Harassment, bullying, or any form of abuse will not be tolerated. This includes unwanted messages, inappropriate comments, or persistent contact after someone has expressed disinterest.
communityGuidelines.respectPrivacyDesc: Don't share personal information about others without their consent. Respect boundaries and privacy settings.
communityGuidelines.noSpamDesc: Don't use Andra for commercial purposes, spam, or fraudulent activities. This includes promoting other services, selling products, or soliciting money.
communityGuidelines.ageVerificationDesc: You must be at least 18 years old to use Andra. Providing false age information will result in immediate account termination.
communityGuidelines.reportInappropriateDesc: If you encounter someone who violates these guidelines, please report them immediately. We take all reports seriously and will investigate promptly.
